question: In the sequence of numbers 5, 8, 15, 20, 29, 40, 53, one number is wrong. The wrong number is :
explanation:
$latex 5\\xrightarrow{+3}8\\xrightarrow{+5}(13)15\\xrightarrow{+7}20\\xrightarrow{+9}29\\xrightarrow{+11}40\\xrightarrow{+13}53$
âˆ´ Incorrect No. = 15
Hence option [C] is the right answer.
